snippet.title: Shinobi Tolerance JAVA GAME (SEGA 2009) FULL WALKTHROUGH
snippet.description:
"Shinobi Tolerance" is one of the most popular games of the eighties. Today this game has been ported to Java format for cell phones! The most powerful weapon of the main character is his Cursed Sword, which can absorb the energy of enemies, but if you do not have time to quench the blood thirst of the Cursed Sword - it will take away levels of life from his master! Mesmerizing version of the Java game on your phone.

Chapters in Game:
0:00 SEGA Logo
0:21 Help
1:28 Options
1:51 Mission 1 - Escape from thу Evil Pit
2:02 Stage 1-1
3:52 Stage 1-2
5:12 Stage 1-3 BOSS - The Flame Ninja
7:03 BONUS STAGE
7:26 Mission 2 - Break Out of the Encirclement
7:32 Stage 2-1
9:41 Stage 2-2
11:51 Stage 2-3
13:32 Stage 2-4 BOSS - The Black Turtle
14:11 BONUS STAGE
14:40 Mission 3 - A Ray of Hope
14:45 Stage 3-1
16:55 Stage 3-2
19:35 Stage 3-3
22:05 Stage 3-4 BOSS - The Statue of Ruiner
22:53 BONUS STAGE
23:22 Mission 4 - Infiltrate to the Evil Den
23:32 Stage 4-1
25:17 Stage 4-2
26:58 Stage 4-3
28:43 Stage 4-4 BOSS - The Frenzy Blade
29:19 BONUS STAGE
29:44 Mission 5 - The Final Strike
29:50 Stage 5-1
31:31 Stage 5-2
33:05 Stage 5-3
35:06 Stage 5-4 BOSS - The Mask of Prajna
36:14 GAME OVER - Epilogue
39:32 About

DOWNLOAD GAME:
http://promobil.kiev.ua/game/fight/14760-shinobi-shinobi.html
https://phoneky.com/games/?id=j4j50750#gsc.tab=0
